des: "A purrrrfect blend of sweetness and pleasure that will numb your tastebuds with delight. Garnish with a strawberry or pineapple wedge."
ins: Place 1/2 cup of strawberries into the container of a blender, and puree. Pour in the pineapple juice, orange juice, melon liqueur and ice cubes. Blend just until slushy. Pour into a tall glass, and garnish with a whole strawberry.
